name: dualpantoframework
description: dev : Oliver Schneider, Jotaro Shigeyama, Alexander Meißner, Nico Böckhoff, Jonas Bounama, Lukas Wagner, Daniel-Amadeus Johannes Glöckner

scripts.install: npm run build-framework && npm run build-firmware
scripts.clean: npm run clean-framework && npm run clean-firmware
scripts.build-framework: npm run build-voice-command && npm run build-serial-plugin && npm run build-serial-standalone
scripts.clean-framework: npm run clean-voice-command && npm run clean-serial-plugin && npm run clean-serial-standalone
scripts.build-firmware: npm run generate-hardware-config && npm run platformio-upload
scripts.clean-firmware: npm run platformio-clean && npm run clean-hardware-config
scripts.clean-hardware-config: make delete target=Firmware/shared/lib/config.cpp && make delete target=Firmware/shared/include/config.hpp

author: jotaro shigeyama
